data

Class LocalStatistic

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.LocalStatistic

  • public class LocalStatistic
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores statistic information about a problem/challenge played by a user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalStatistic(int problemId, boolean isRepoProblem, java.sql.Timestamp startTime)
      Constructor for a Client object.
